mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance(user_id, checkin_time, location, method, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{checkinTime}, #{location}, #{method}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.checkin_time, a.location, a.method, a.status, u.full_name AS fullName, u.username AS userName FROM attendance a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.checkin_time DESC
